changeSet.createView: select id, history from employee e full outer join ( select employee_id as eid, STRING_AGG( concat_ws(':',to_char(date_employed, 'mm-dd-yyyy')::text, to_char(date_unemployed, 'mm-dd-yyyy')::text), ',' order by employee_id, date_employed) AS history from employment_history h group by employee_id ) pos on e.id = pos.eid
